related_materials.name: Molecular Biology Grade Water Tested to USP Sterile Purified Water Specifications
Magnesium chloride, hexahydrate, cell culture reagent

status.info:
We use this protocol and it's working.

Tissue collection for this protocol needs prior approval by the users' Institutional Review Board (IRB) or equivalent ethics committee

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"dmmvo","text":"Prechill any tubes, buffers or tools. Set the centrifuge to  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":60,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1jlc2","text":"For each sample to be homogenized, prepare a Dounce Tissue Grinder with 2 pestles (“Loose” and “Tight”). Remove from 70% ethanol storage, rinse with MilliQ water three times. Place mortars (buckets) in ice. Dry pestles with kimwipe and place on clean parafilm on top of ice to chill.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2htmt","text":"Remove excessive water collected at the bottom of mortars with p1000.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dftvk","text":"Add   of NIM-DP and   of Triton X-100 to each bucket to make   of NIM-DP-L. Pipette mix.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"990","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"57jlk","text":"Tip tissue into mortar or resuspend tissue in   of NIM-DP-L buffer and transfer to a Dounce homogenizer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":46,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"aeqis","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1c3s8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"al4r7","text":"Be gentle and avoid introducing bubbles.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c0657","text":"Homogenize the sample by using the Loose pestle (usually 5-10 strokes) followed by the tight pestle (usually 15-25). Switch pestles when most of the tissue has been broken up into small pieces and use the tight pestle to homogenize until the solution is uniform (no obvious particles).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"sm5d","text":"Filter using a   CellTrics filter into LoBind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"thickness","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":202,"value":"30"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9c021","text":"Centrifuge nuclei  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"mhv0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6q1no","text":"Discard the supernatant and gently resuspend pellet in   of NIM-DP. Centrifuge nuclei  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":55,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8s0q2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"1000","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"49mjb","text":"Add 7-AAD to Sort Buffer (1:1000) to a final concentration of  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":62,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b8tm2","text":"Discard supernatant from pelleted nuclei. Gently resuspend pellet in   of sort buffer + 7-AAD by mixing with a p1000 pipette ~5 times or until no clumps are visible.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"35vop","text":"Sort 120,000 nuclei into a LoBind tube containing   of collection buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"87.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fu7f4","text":"Measure the total volume of the sorted nuclei in the collection buffer via reverse pipetting.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2t0hg","text":"Add the appropriate amount of 5X permeabilization buffer for a final concentration of 1X, and gently pipette mix with p1000 5 times.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5qa04","text":"Incubate   for  , then centrifuge  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":15,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4cdtk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"500","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"85rvb","text":"Slowly remove the supernatant until 20-30 μL remains in the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fnj7b","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c45kg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"51ivd","text":"Do not disturb pellet.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fvjn4","text":"Slowly add   of Wash Buffer along wall of tube (try not to disturb pellet) and immediately centrifuge  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":11,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":102,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"650","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"500","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":1324}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqno6","text":"Prepare tubes for counting nuclei on hemocytometer by adding   of 1X Nuclei Buffer to each tube for a 1:16 dilution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5a9qh","text":"Very carefully remove the supernatant, switching to a p20 pipette once the supernatant volume is \u003c . Leave ~  to avoid disturbing the pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":98,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":108,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"biesg","text":"Add   of 1X Nuclei Buffer and very gently resuspend pellet 4 times. Immediately take   and add to tube for counting containing   of 1X Nuclei Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":85,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":127,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"7","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"97g9i","text":"Count nuclei by stain with   Trypan Blue (Invitrogen, T10282), count on a hemocytometer and record images from the microscope field. For calculating nuclei concentration of original stock multiply count average x 10 x 16 (dilution factor).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"8","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
